lead_paragraph: Alessandro Bertolini of the Diquigiovanni team won the 11th stage of the Giro d’Italia, a hilly 124-mile course from Urbania to Cesena. Bertolini sprinted away when his Italian compatriot Fortunato Baliani crashed about 500 yards from the finish. Giovanni Visconti of the Quick Step team was one of many riders who crashed in the rain, but he retained the overall race lead.
